title: Sports and Hobbies 1
sentences: I often play soccer on the weekend.
Do you like to go jogging in the park?
I swim in the lake every morning.
We like to hike in the mountains.
I like listening to classical music best.
Do you like to dance at parties?
I often paint pictures in my free time.
Are we going to the gym today?
I like to cook for my friends.
Do you often ride the bicycle?
We like to watch movies in the evening.
Do you sing in a choir?
Do you have an interesting hobby?
I like to play chess with my father.
We often go skiing in winter.
I am interested in modern art.
We play cards on Friday evening.
dictionary:
der Fußball - soccer / football
das Hobby - hobby
joggen - to jog
schwimmen - to swim
wandern - to hike
das Instrument - instrument
die Musik - music
tanzen - to dance
malen - to paint / draw
das Fitnessstudio - gym
der Basketball - basketball
kochen - to cook
das Fahrrad - bicycle
der Film (Pl. Filme) - movie
singen - to sing
fotografieren - to photograph
das Schach - chess
skifahren - to ski
der Sport - sport / exercise
die Kunst - art
das Gärtnern - gardening
die Münze (Pl. Münzen) - coin
die Karte (Pl. Karten) - card
das Training - training / practice
